info.title: Prepaid Mobile Recharge
info.description: Process flow for prepaid recharge payments.

post.description: Use this endpoint to obtain a Bearer token required for all other API calls.

ClientID.description: The client ID provided by Setu for your application.

Secret.description: The client secret provided by Setu for your application. Keep this confidential.

grant_type.description: The OAuth2 grant type. Must be set to 'client_credentials'.

access_token.description: Bearer token to be used in Authorization header for subsequent API calls

message.example: You are not authenticated to perform the requested action.

traceId.description: Unique identifier for tracing the request

example.message: You are not authenticated to perform the requested action.

post.summary: API to fetch operator details for mobile number

name.description: The display name of the parameter. Must be 'Mobile Number' for this endpoint.

value.description: The 10-digit mobile number whose operator details are being fetched. Must contain only numeric characters.

billParameters.description: Parameters for fetching Operator and Location details for mobile number. This array should contain exactly one object with name='Mobile Number'.

mobile.description: The 10-digit mobile number of the user initiating the recharge. This may or may not be the same as the number being recharged.

customer.description: The details needed for fetching operator details.

mobile_number.description: The 10-digit mobile number for which the operator details are retrieved.

current_location.description: Operator Circle , valid values are : `Kolkata `,` Mumbai `,` Delhi `,` Chennai `,` Maharashtra `,` Gujarat `,` Andhra Pradesh `,` Karnataka `,` Tamil Nadu `,` Kerala `,` Punjab `,` Haryana `,` Uttar Pradesh (East) `,` Uttar Pradesh (West) `,` Madhya Pradesh `,` Rajasthan `,` West Bengal & AN Island `,` Orissa `,` Himachal Pradesh `,` Bihar & Jharkhand `,` Assam `,` NorthEast `,` J&K `,` Uttaranchal `,` All `,` IND`

previous_operator.description: Previous Network provider `jio` `airtel` `vi` `bsnl` `mtnl`. Incase of it is never ported `None`

previous_location.description: Previous Operator Circle if any , valid values are : `Kolkata `,` Mumbai `,` Delhi `,` Chennai `,` Maharashtra `,` Gujarat `,` Andhra Pradesh `,` Karnataka `,` Tamil Nadu `,` Kerala `,` Punjab `,` Haryana `,` Uttar Pradesh (East) `,` Uttar Pradesh (West) `,` Madhya Pradesh `,` Rajasthan `,` West Bengal & AN Island `,` Orissa `,` Himachal Pradesh `,` Bihar & Jharkhand `,` Assam `,` NorthEast `,` J&K `,` Uttaranchal `,` All `,` IND`

ported.description: Parameter indicating if mobile number was ported previously

data.description: Details for listing mobile number details required for fetching plans and recharge

traceId.description: Identifier associated with this response for debug purposes

error.message: Balance API is not available in UAT environment

post.summary: API to fetch prepaid plans for a mobile number

name.description: The display name of the parameter. Must be one of: 'Mobile Number', 'Operator', or 'Location'.

value.description: The value for the parameter. For 'Mobile Number': 10-digit number. For 'Operator': lowercase operator name (e.g., `jio`, `airtel`, `vi`, `bsnl`, `mtnl`). For 'Location': exact circle name.

billParameters.description: Parameters for fetching prepaid plans. This array should contain three objects with names: 'Mobile Number', 'Operator', and 'Location'.

mobile.description: The 10-digit mobile number of the user initiating the recharge. This may or may not be the same as the number being recharged.

customer.description: The details needed for fetching prepaid plans.

amount.description: Price of the plan in paise (1/100 of a rupee). For example, 19900 paise = 199 INR.

data.description: Details for listing available plans for the mobile number

traceId.description: Identifier associated with this response for debug purposes

parameters.name: X-PRODUCT-INSTANCE-ID
parameters.description: Unique identifier provided by Setu that represents your product instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization. Format: 'Bearer {token}' where {token} is access token recieved from token API.

mobile.description: The login mobile number of the initiating recharge

name.description: The display name of the parameter.

value.description: The value of the customer mobile number whose details are being fetched.

name.description: The display name of the parameter.
The display name of the parameter.

value.description: The location or region of the customer.

billParameters.description: Parameters for fetching prepaid plans, including Mobile Number, Operator, and Location.

customer.description: The details needed for fetching prepaid plans.

post.summary: API to initiate a prepaid recharge request for a mobile number

name.description: The display name of the parameter. Must be one of: 'Mobile Number', 'Operator', or 'Location'.

value.description: The value for the parameter. For 'Mobile Number': 10-digit number. For 'Operator': lowercase operator name (e.g., 'jio', 'airtel', 'vi', 'bsnl', 'mtnl'). For 'Location': exact circle name.

billParameters.description: Parameters for the recharge request. This array should contain three objects with names: 'Mobile Number', 'Operator', and 'Location'.

mobile.description: The 10-digit mobile number of the user initiating the recharge. This may or may not be the same as the number being recharged.

customer.description: Details needed for identifying the customer and the recharge request

amount.description: Recharge amount in paise (1/100 of a rupee). For example, 1900 paise = 19 INR.

mode.description:
The payment mode used for the recharge. **Accepted values:**
- `Internet Banking`
- `UPI`
- `Debit Card`
- `Credit Card`
- `Wallet`

The value must match exactly as shown above (case-sensitive).

paymentParams.description: Additional payment parameters if required by specific payment modes. Currently, an empty array is sufficient.

paymentRefId.description: Unique reference ID for the payment transaction. This must be unique for each transaction and is used for status checks.Must be a alphanumeric string with length between 5 and 30 characters.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the payment was initiated, in ISO 8601 format with timezone (e.g., '2024-02-07T13:54:00+05:30').

paymentDetails.description: Details of the payment for the recharge

refId.description: Optional unique reference ID for the recharge request. If not provided, the system will use paymentRefId as the reference.

error.description: Error details if any, otherwise null

mobile_number.description: Mobile number associated with the transaction

service_type.description: Represents the service type. Always set to 'M' for Mobile.

is_postpaid.description: Indicates if the mobile number is postpaid

is_special.description: Indicates if this is a special service

transactionRefId.description: Unique reference ID for the transaction

status.description:
Status of the recharge transaction.

Possible values:
- `Success`
- `Processing`
- `Failure`

operatorRefId.description: Reference ID provided by the operator

trace_id.description: Identifier associated with this response for debugging purposes

message.example: Value error, allowed payment modes : ['Internet Banking', 'UPI', 'Debit Card', 'Credit Card', 'Wallet']: paymentDetails.mode

error.message: Value error, allowed payment modes : ['Internet Banking', 'UPI', 'Debit Card', 'Credit Card', 'Wallet']: paymentDetails.mode

parameters.name: X-PRODUCT-INSTANCE-ID
parameters.description: Unique identifier provided by Setu that represents your product instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization. Format: 'Bearer {token}' where {token} is access token recieved from token API.

name.description: The display name of the parameter.

value.description: The value of the customer mobile number or related info like Operator and Location.

billParameters.description: Parameters for the recharge request, including Mobile Number, Operator, and Location.

mobile.description: The mobile number initiating the recharge

customer.description: Details needed for identifying the customer and the recharge request

amount.description: Recharge amount in paise (1/100 of a rupee). Must be a positive integer value representing the amount in paise.

mode.description: The payment mode used for the recharge. Must be one of: 'Internet Banking', 'UPI', 'Debit Card', 'Credit Card', or 'Wallet'.

paymentParams.description: Additional payment parameters in case any

paymentRefId.description: Reference ID for the payment transaction

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the payment was initiated, in ISO 8601 format with timezone. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+TZ (e.g., '2024-02-07T13:54:00+05:30').

paymentDetails.description: Details of the payment for the recharge

refId.description: Optional unique reference ID for the recharge request. If provided, must be an alphanumeric string with length between 5 and 40 characters.

post.summary: API to check the status of a prepaid recharge transaction

paymentRefId.description: Reference ID for the payment transaction whose status is being queried. This is the same paymentRefId used in the original recharge request.

error.description: Error details if any, otherwise null

mobile_number.description: Mobile number associated with the transaction

service_type.description: Represents the service type. Always set to 'M' for Mobile.

is_postpaid.description: Indicates if the mobile number is postpaid

is_special.description: Indicates if this is a special service

transactionRefId.description: Unique reference ID for the transaction

status.description:
Status of the recharge transaction.

Possible values:
- `Success`
- `Processing`
- `Failure`

operatorRefId.description: Reference ID provided by the operator

trace_id.description: Identifier associated with this response for debugging purposes

error.message: Value error, Invalid input: 'paymentRefId' should be alphanumeric: paymentRefId

get.summary: API to fetch the balance of the wallet

parameters.name: X-PRODUCT-INSTANCE-ID
parameters.description: Unique identifier provided by Setu that represents your product instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization. Format: 'Bearer {token}' where {token} is access token recieved from token API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return per page. Default is 100.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Starts from 1. Default is 1 if not specified.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: Filter transactions by operator name. Must be one of: 'Jio', 'Airtel', 'Vi', 'BSNL', or 'MTNL'.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for transaction history in YYYY-MM-DD format. Cannot be more than 90 days in the past.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for transaction history in YYYY-MM-DD format. Cannot be in the future or before start_date.

parameters.name: X-PRODUCT-INSTANCE-ID
parameters.description: Unique identifier provided by Setu that represents your product instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization. Format: 'Bearer {token}' where {token} is access token recieved from token API.

mobile_number.description: Mobile number involved in the transaction

status.description: Status of the transaction. Possible values: `Successful`, `Processing`, `Failure`, `Reversed`.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the transaction occurred

traceId.description: Identifier associated with this response for debug purposes

200.description: Response containing the list of transactions

clientID.description: clientID from the API key pair

secret.description: secret from the API key pair

token.description: Token to be used in subsequent requests
